articles.description: Arsenal cruise to a seventh successive Premier League win as they put six past a dreadful Sheffield United side at Bramall Lane.
articles.title: Arsenal put six past abysmal Sheffield United

articles.description: The president of motorsport's governing body is under investigation for an alleged attempt to interfere over a Formula 1 race result.
articles.title: Mohammed Ben Sulayem: FIA president under investigation for alleged attempt to interfere over F1 race

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Which player has come of age? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Are Bayern Munich heading towards their worst ever season for over a decade, or can Thomas Tuchel's side bounce back against the odds?
articles.title: Are Bayern Munich set for their worst season in over a decade?

articles.description: Paul Tierney is not selected as a referee for the next round of Premier League matches after his mistake in Liverpool's win at Nottingham Forest.
articles.title: Tierney not selected to referee game this weekend

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at the Premier League's most in-form players after Man City boss Pep Guardiola talked up Phil Foden.
articles.title: Is Foden 'the best in the Premier League right now'?

articles.description: A tearful Jason Kelce confirms his retirement after 13 seasons with the Philadelphia Eagles.
articles.title: NFL: Jason Kelce confirms retirement after 13 seasons with the Philadelphia Eagles

articles.description: Chelsea striker Sam Kerr is set to appear in court next year after being charged with a racially aggravated offence, which she denies.
articles.title: Kerr pleads not guilty to racially aggravated offence

articles.description: England spinner Tom Hartley hopes Nathan Lyon's arrival at Lancashire can be a "game-changer" for his bowling.
articles.title: I hope Lyon is a game-changer for me - Hartley

articles.description: UK Sport and UK Athletics are planning to bid to host the 2029 World Championships.
articles.title: World Athletics Championships: UK Sport & UK Athletics plan 2029 bid
